_comment: Hikvision NAS Monitor Configuration - Copy to hikvision_monitor_config.json and customize
_security_warning: NEVER commit the actual config file to version control!

nas._note: mount_path: Full path to NAS Camera folder (must be mounted before script starts)
nas._note2: check_interval: Seconds between file system checks (default: 2)

openhab._note2: html_path: Directory where web-served files are saved

ocr._note: tesseract_timeout: Maximum seconds for OCR processing
ocr._note2: panel_crop_height: Pixels to crop from bottom of image for analysis panel

output._note: temp_path: Directory for temporary detection snapshots
